tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hello
This is Khushbu Lalan age 37yrs.
I was going through braces n Ortho treatment to some other doctors, but some how my whole treatment was going wrong,my mouth was in very bad condition.. my complications too increased.
I was very upset as no other doctors where ready to take my case in this condition,i could hardly eat properly,then through internet i came through Dr Urvi,read the reviews n reached to her,
She patiently handled my case.,studied the case with all faculty doctors. Her assistant doctors Dr Henal n Dr Shweta with staff Pratibha have supported my case.. Dr Jay took my Braces case very smartly..Today i can eat properly n My face is getting much better.. Happy n Relived  that i m in there handsðŸ˜Š

Dr Urvi's clinic is one of the finest state of the art clinic in dentistry seen in Mulund. The staff is courteous, knows their respective jobs well. I was advised for wisdom tooth removal by couple of doctors since had abscess. Dr Urvi patiently checked me thoroughly and advised that i could just have the infection removed. It took her over an hour to do the procedure. Things went well and i have fully recovered with my tooth intact :) Thank you Dr Urvi. I would strongly recommend her to everyone. All the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experince was truly second to none Dr Urvi and her staff was incredibly helpful,thorough and informative throughout my treatment.She makes you feel comfortable and her approach is very friendly.She is always there to clear all your doubts regarding your treatment.One of the best dental clinics in mumbai for implants.I am sure and convinced to have found my dentist for life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I initially landed up with a lot of problems in my teeth and was worried whether it would get resolve. The doctors told me that I had to undergo some root canal treatments and cap fittings. They explained and executed the treatment very well. The doctors were and staff of the clinic were very cooperative and the treatment was painless.

Most Helpful Feedback(2/3) The ambience is very soothing and calms you down. The staff is very polite. I didnâ€™t have to wait much before meeting the doctor. Doctor is a patient listener and builds your confidence. He has vast knowledge in the field and gives a detailed description of the issue. The doctor went through all the investigation reports done earlier and shared the explanation for the ailment found in detail. He also assured me that ailment can be addressed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to the clinic with a frown on my face and came out with a smile. It was not just about why I needed a root canal treatment but she explained me why I didnâ€™t have healthy gums and what I need to do about it. I now know that I can always rely on Dr Urvi Shah if I have any dental problems in near future. I am absolutely satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It's the best experience that I have received till yet. Everything was prompt, friendly, nicely explained. I would suggest everyone to visit here once. They have highly experienced team and a very unique technique for painless procedures.  For example like - Painless root canaling in one sitting,  teeth fixing in 3day's etc. Thank you Dr. Urvi and Team for the painless treatment.

I had lot of sensitivity issues in my teeth. But Dr urvi guided me so well that all my tooth sensitivity has now gone.. I can eat drink cold n hot easily.. she helped me with correct way of brushing n gave me appropriate suggestions. She is indeed a very wonderful dentist. She is very patient and genuine.. Thank you Dr urvi..

Dr urvi did painless root canal in my teeth. i was very much scared to do root canal but dr urvi removed all my fear. she also did a single sitting root canal treatment. so i was very much comfortable. her job was upto the mark. also the staff was very pleasing n helpful. the overall clinics environment was hygienic and comforting.

Dr urvi and her staff were very polite and Co operative.. she patiently listened to me and explained me in detaiL all the treatment options.. her diagnosis was upto the mark.. even her skill n gentle care for  her makes her an unique dentist.. thanks to her and wish her all d success in her life..

Dr. Urvi Shah has an excellent method as a dentist and is very thorough in her approach. The clinic had all the latest computer based technologies. My treatment was completely painless. I would strongly recommend her as a dentist and the go-to person for all your dental problems!

Dr urvi shah has been a fantastic dentist. she is  always making sure.i,m comfortable with each cleaning and filling. additionally she is straight forward about necessary treatment vs options. dr urvi shah and her staff were wonderful and skilful, the technology they r using is really ice and modern highly recomended.

Dr. Urvi has an excellent method as a dentist and she is very thorough in her approach. She is extremely familiar with all of the latest in computer-based dental technology and she used much of it in her clinic. Dr. Urvi  was a painless dentist, which is one of the things that made her so popular.

I would strongly recommend Dr. Urvi as a dentist and I am certain that you will find other patients who feel the same way.

I am very happy with my treatment by her. she is one amazing dentist I have met. thank you so much Dr. urvi shah. now I recommend all my friends and family to her.
